# ANcpLua Framework Documentation

> MSBuild SDK with Roslyn analyzers, polyfills, and sensible defaults for .NET 10.

## Sections

- **SDK** (`/sdk/*`): MSBuild SDK configuration, variants, properties
- **Analyzers** (`/analyzers/*`): 24 diagnostic rules + 2 refactorings
- **Utilities** (`/utilities/*`): Roslyn utilities for source generators
- **API** (`/api-reference/*`): qyl observability REST API

## SDK Variants

| Variant | Use Case |
|---------|----------|
| `ANcpLua.NET.Sdk` | Libraries, Console, Workers |
| `ANcpLua.NET.Sdk.Web` | ASP.NET Core APIs (OpenTelemetry, health endpoints) |
| `ANcpLua.NET.Sdk.Test` | xUnit v3 with Microsoft Testing Platform |

## Key Pages

### Getting Started
- `/index` - Overview and installation
- `/quickstart` - Step-by-step setup

### SDK
- `/sdk/overview` - Feature summary
- `/sdk/variants` - Variant comparison
- `/sdk/msbuild-properties` - All MSBuild properties
- `/sdk/service-defaults` - Web SDK configuration
- `/sdk/polyfills` - netstandard2.0 compatibility
- `/sdk/banned-apis` - Deprecated API enforcement
- `/sdk/testing` - Test base classes

### Analyzers
- `/analyzers/overview` - Rule table with severity
- `/analyzers/configuration` - EditorConfig settings
- `/analyzers/rules/AL0001` through `/analyzers/rules/AL0025` - Individual rules

### Utilities
- `/utilities/overview` - Package overview
- `/utilities/diagnostic-flow` - Railway-oriented diagnostics
- `/utilities/patterns` - Symbol pattern matching
- `/utilities/semantic-guard` - Declarative validation

## Navigation Hints

| Query | Page |
|-------|------|
| "getting started", "setup" | `/quickstart` |
| "MSBuild properties" | `/sdk/msbuild-properties` |
| "polyfills", "netstandard" | `/sdk/polyfills` |
| "banned APIs", "DateTime" | `/sdk/banned-apis` |
| "analyzer rules", "AL0XXX" | `/analyzers/rules/AL0XXX` |
| "source generators" | `/utilities/overview` |
| "DiagnosticFlow" | `/utilities/diagnostic-flow` |
| "testing", "xUnit" | `/sdk/testing` |
| "OpenTelemetry", "web" | `/sdk/service-defaults` |

## Requirements

- .NET 10 SDK
- Central Package Management (`ManagePackageVersionsCentrally=true`)

## External Links

- Live docs: https://ancplua.io
- NuGet: https://www.nuget.org/profiles/ANcpLua

### GitHub Repos

- https://github.com/ANcpLua/ANcpLua.NET.Sdk
- https://github.com/ANcpLua/ANcpLua.Analyzers
- https://github.com/ANcpLua/ANcpLua.Roslyn.Utilities
- https://github.com/ANcpLua/ErrorOrX
- https://github.com/ANcpLua/mintlify-docs
- https://github.com/ANcpLua/ancplua-claude-plugins
